targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pack_enabled" or
 r["_field"] == "pack_active" or r["_field"] == "client_count" or r["_field"] == "max_clients")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["pack_name"], columnKey: ["_fie
ld"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with utilization: if exists r.max_clients and r.max_clients > 0 then float(v: r.client_count) / float(v: r.max_clients)
 * 100.0 else 0.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["pack_name", "pack_enabled", "pack_active", "client_count", "max_clients", "utilization"])

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "client_count")

  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "client_count")

  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["pack_name"])
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "client_distribution")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "client_count" or
 r["_field"] == "max_clients")
  |> last()
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["pack_name"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({pack_name: r.pack_
name, _time: r._time, _value: if r.max_clients > 0 then float(v: r.client_count) / float(v: r.max_clients) * 100.0 else 0.0}))
  |> yield(name: "utilization")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pack_enabled")

  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "total_packs")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "pack_active")

 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_value"] == "true")
  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> count()
  |> yield(name: "active_packs")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "client_count")

  |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "total_clients")

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vns3_clientpacks")\
n  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["topology"] == "${topology}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "max_clients")

 |> last()
  |> group()
  |> sum()
  |> yield(name: "max_capacity")

from(bucket: "telegraf") |> range(start: -1h) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "vns3_clientpacks") |> keep(columns: ["host"]) |> distinct(col
umn: "host") |> yield(name: "hosts")

r r["_field"] == "tcp_out_segments")

me: "rate")

ved" or r["_field"] == "udp_datagrams_sent")
